channel.title: Release Notes: Square Web Payments SDK
channel.description: Release notes for Square Web Payments SDK.

item.title: ACH and Afterpay updates
item.description:
The Web Payments SDK's newest changes include updates to the `ach.tokenize()` parameters and a rebranded Afterpay experience for US-based buyers.
* **ACH** * An [`intent`](web-payments/add-ach) field has been added to the ACH tokenization...

item.title: New card payment flow for card on file with `STORE` and `CHARGE` intents (beta)
item.description: * **Web Payments SDK:** * (Beta) Support for a new payment flow with the `Card.tokenize()` method for payment processing, buyer verification, and cards on file use cases. For more information, see: * [Take a Card Payment](web-payments/tak...

item.title: New card payment flow for charging and storing a card on file (beta)
item.description: (Beta) Support for `CHARGE_AND_STORE` card payments on file with the new payment method flow that uses additional parameters for `tokenize()` to initiate SCA and buyer verification without calling `verifyBuyer()` in payment requests.

item.title: New card payment flow (beta)
item.description: (Beta) A new card payment method flow that uses additional parameters for `tokenize()` to initiate SCA and buyer verification without calling `verifyBuyer()` in payment requests. For more information, see [Take a Card Payment with the Web P...

item.title: Documentation updates
item.description:
### Documentation updates
The [Migrate to the Web Payments SDK](web-payments/migrate) guide has been updated to clarify what you need to do to start using the Web Payments SDK.

item.title: Updated ACH and Cash App Pay payment method documentation
item.description:
### Documentation updates
The following updates apply to the Web Payments SDK documentation:
* [Take ACH Bank Transfer Payments](web-payments/add-ach). Added more details and code samples about OAuth Plaid authorization and tokenization. ...

item.title: New Square Gift Card payment topics, and new Cash App Pay embedded video tutorial added to topic
item.description:
### Documentation updates
The following updates apply to the Web Payments SDK documentation:
- Added the following topics about working with Square gift cards: - [Square Gift Card Payments with the Web Payments SDK](web-payments/gift-car...

item.title: Square Developer embedded video tutorials added to topics, and Digital Wallets now supported in Australia
item.description:
* Added embedded video tutorials to the following topics: * [Web Payments SDK Overview](web-payments/overview) * [Take a Card Payment with the Web Payments SDK](web-payments/take-card-payment)
* Support for digital wallets in Australia. ...

item.title: Web Payments SDK Documentation Updates
item.description:
### Documentation updates
* [Web Payments SDK Overview:](/web-payments/overview) * Added information about examples of application integrations with the SDK and with PHP and Node.js. * Clarified how the SDK and Payments API work together...

item.title: Afterpay and Cash App Pay support
item.description: ## Updates to Web Payments SDK version 1.0 The Web Payments SDK has been updated with support for Afterpay and Cash App Pay payment methods.

item.title: Feature updates and bug fixes
item.description:
## Web Payments SDK version 1.0 updates The Web Payments SDK has been updated for performance, bug fixes, and support for locales.
### Details
* `payments.setLocale()` now supports these locale/languages: * 'en-IE' * 'en-CA' * 'en-GB'...

item.title: Initial public release of the Web Payments SDK
item.description:
## New release: Web Payments SDK
* Version 1.0
## Details Version 1 of the Square [Web Payments SDK](/web-payments/overview) replaces the deprecated SqPaymentForm. This JavaScript SDK provides a secure buyer payment card entry method alo...
